function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Social resistance to following minimal protocol requests such as mask use and distancing.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and potential resurgence of the disease leading to park closures.","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, community engagement, and enforcement of park rules.","Technologies":"Social media, signage, and communication technology for public announcements.","People":"Park visitors, children, young people, and joggers.","Owner":"Park management and local authorities."},{"Description":"Vandalism of warning resources such as yellow ribbons and banners.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of communication and warning efforts, leading to potential failure to prevent overcrowding and non-compliance.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and replacement of warning resources, community involvement in protecting park facilities.","Technologies":"Security cameras, community watch programs, and durable warning materials.","People":"Park management, local authorities, and community members.","Owner":"Park management and local authorities."},{"Description":"Crowding in restricted areas and resistance to park closures by some users.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to overcrowding and non-compliance, potentially leading to heightened community spread of disease.","Mitigation":"Improved crowd management, enforcement of park closure rules, and community engagement to promote responsible park usage.","Technologies":"Geospatial tracking, crowd monitoring technology, and communication tools for community engagement.","People":"Park visitors, local residents, and park management.","Owner":"Park management and local authorities."}]}
